Line 55: Line 55:
==Release==
==Release==
â
[[Image:Zombies of Mass Destruction.jpg|thumb|right|DVD cover for ZMD]]
 
''ZMD: Zombies of Mass Destruction'' premiered at Film Fest DC and has screened at the [[Seattle International Film Festival]], the [[Minneapolis-St. Paul International Film Festival]], the [[Los Angeles Film Festival]], and Philadelphia's [[Philadelphia International Gay & Lesbian Film Festival|QFest]].<ref>http://www.qfest.com/film-details.cfm?c=230&id=8980</ref> The film runs at [[8 Films To Die For]], also known as the [[After Dark Horrorfest]].<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.bloody-disgusting.com/news/17783|title=After Dark Acquires 'Zombies of Mass Destruction'}}</ref> It premiered on January 29<ref>{{Cite web|url=http://www.bloody-disgusting.com/news/18678|title=Horrorfest '10: Trailer Debut for 'Kill Theory': Let's Decide Together, Who Lives & Who Dies?}}</ref> at NYC Zombie Village Crawl.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.dreadcentral.com/news/35588/in-nyc-walk-with-zombies-horrorfest-4|title=In NYC? Walk with the Zombies of Horrorfest 4!}}</ref> The DVD was released on March 23, 2010 in the United States, and included information on the making of the film.<ref>{{Cite web|url=http://www.dreadcentral.com/news/35540/after-dark-horrorfest-plot-synopses|title=After Dark Horrorfest Plot Synopses and DVD Features}}</ref>
''ZMD: Zombies of Mass Destruction'' premiered at Film Fest DC and has screened at the [[Seattle International Film Festival]], the [[Minneapolis-St. Paul International Film Festival]], the [[Los Angeles Film Festival]], and Philadelphia's [[Philadelphia International Gay & Lesbian Film Festival|QFest]].<ref>http://www.qfest.com/film-details.cfm?c=230&id=8980</ref> The film runs at [[8 Films To Die For]], also known as the [[After Dark Horrorfest]].<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.bloody-disgusting.com/news/17783|title=After Dark Acquires 'Zombies of Mass Destruction'}}</ref> It premiered on January 29<ref>{{Cite web|url=http://www.bloody-disgusting.com/news/18678|title=Horrorfest '10: Trailer Debut for 'Kill Theory': Let's Decide Together, Who Lives & Who Dies?}}</ref> at NYC Zombie Village Crawl.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.dreadcentral.com/news/35588/in-nyc-walk-with-zombies-horrorfest-4|title=In NYC? Walk with the Zombies of Horrorfest 4!}}</ref> The DVD was released on March 23, 2010 in the United States, and included information on the making of the film.<ref>{{Cite web|url=http://www.dreadcentral.com/news/35540/after-dark-horrorfest-plot-synopses|title=After Dark Horrorfest Plot Synopses and DVD Features}}</ref>
